title: Middle Eastern lentil salad
ingredients: ['250 g (8½ oz) green lentils, rinsed', '1 garlic clove', 'good pinch of ground cumin', '1 slice of lemon', '1 small red onion, finely chopped', '85 g (3 oz) ready-to-eat dried apricots, roughly chopped', '3 small peppers (1 red, 1 yellow and 1 green), seeded and cut into 2 cm (¾ in) squares', '100 g (3½ oz) broccoli, broken into small florets', "50 g (1¾ oz) firm rindless goat's cheese", '2 tbsp toasted sunflower seeds', 'Lemon and coriander dressing', 'juice of 1 lemon', '3 tbsp extra virgin olive oil', '2 tbsp finely chopped fresh coriander', 'salt and pepper']
